comments.body:
I think it has something to do with Boneshield ... since it doesnt show up in the bars anywhere, but it is apparently in the export string.


> Posted by CurseForge user gannon416

Does it happen after you reload your UI?

If so, run this command and tell me what the output is:

print(TMW.profile[6][8]:GetSettings().Conditions[1].BitFlags)

If so, try installing the latest alpha version from http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/files/ and let me know what the new error is.

Edited Jan 18, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yes, happens when i log in, reloadui, or type /tmw.

Here is the output:

table: 0x1ba1bbb00


> Posted by CurseForge user gannon416

Ok, thanks. Will fix it in the next alpha version. (The issue was that the code was expecting those to be capital letters. Not sure why they are lower case for you, but its an easy fix!)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Fixed in g472554c


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

glad i could help ;-D

working like a charm in new alpha

Edited Jan 18, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user gannon416
